definition: honest and unaffected but not talkative (idiom)
see 沉默寡言[chen2 mo4 gua3 yan2]

sentences.english: She rarely spoke, she had no connection with the world.
sentences.chinese: 她寡言少語，與外界毫無聯繫。

sentences.english: But at a dinner-party one would rather be a mosquito than a mute.
sentences.chinese: 但在晚宴席上，人們寧願做一隻蚊子也不願沉默寡言。

sentences.english: She had got the habit of silence anyway-that was fixed.
sentences.chinese: 她有一個沉默寡言的習慣，無論如何也不會改變。

sentences.english: I am very British in that I'm reticent.
sentences.chinese: 沉默寡言是我非常英國化的一面。

sentences.english: The child is always taciturn like this.
sentences.chinese: 他總是沉默寡言，不喜歡跟人交流。

sentences.english: John is always quiet as a mouse in the office.
sentences.chinese: 約翰在辦公室裏總是寡言少語。

sentences.english: Masterful Scorpio should make a good mate for quiet spoken Cancer.
sentences.chinese: 主任派頭的天蠍會是寡言少語巨蟹的好伴侶。

sentences.english: Though Zidane is very quiet off the field, he steps up his performance.
sentences.chinese: 球場下齊達內沉默寡言，他的球技和日臻完美。

sentences.english: She dignified and beautiful, gentle calm personality, known as man of few words.
sentences.chinese: 她美麗端莊，性格溫柔平和，平時寡言少語。

sentences.english: The girl starts to become the silence to be uncommunicative.
sentences.chinese: 女孩開始變得沉默寡言。

sentences.english: Wise men are silent; fools talk.
sentences.chinese: 聰明的人寡言，愚蠢的人話多。

sentences.english: He talked very little and seemed all the more mysterious for his taciturn manner.
sentences.chinese: 他極少說話，而他沉默寡言的舉止似乎使他更神祕了。

sentences.english: He is a very quiet and retiring person.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位沉默寡言不愛交際的人。

sentences.english: They take care of chat, that I am a reticent person, accustomed to.
sentences.chinese: 她們自顧閒談，以爲我是一個寡言的人，習以爲常。

sentences.english: Aunty Henny was an outgoing but reticent person.
sentences.chinese: 漢妮伯母是個直爽但又沉默寡言的人。

sentences.english: Walking among the tombstones and flowers, Angel grows quiet.
sentences.chinese: 穿梭於墓碑與鮮花之間，安傑爾開始變得寡言少語了。

definition: honest and unaffected but not talkative (idiom)
see 沉默寡言[chen2 mo4 gua3 yan2]
spacious and well-lit/open and clear/(of character) optimistic/cheerful/carefree
lit. closed gourd/fig. enigma/complete mystery/taciturn person
cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
